description: AChieving the Millenium Development Goals and Reducing Human Poverty

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: This project seeks to enhance capacities of policy and decision makers to formulate pro-poor and development-oriented policies using updated poverty data.  This will support the Philippine government in formulating an enhanced MDG-based poverty reduction strategy program for 2005 to 2010 that focuses on operational mechanisms of reducing poverty incidence from 34% to 17%, in line with MDG 1 and the Medium Term Philippine Development Plan 2004-2010 targets.  This will also support efforts directed towards strengthening partnerships among key poverty reduction stakeholders.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Pro-Poor Policy Reform

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities

subproject.title: Pro-Poor Policy Reform

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: This project is designed to support the establishment and institutionalization of an integrated, localized, MDG and rights-based poverty monitoring and mapping systems.  This also seeks to ensure that poverty data and maps are updated regularly and povertry monitoring systems are functioning.  Development and regular updating of MDG Progress Report is one of the key outputs.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Poverty Monitoring and Mapping
